39.title: My First Post
39.excerpt: This is my first post! I'm pretty excited.

3000.title: Home
3000.excerpt:
Nog
Nog is a simple site generator for GitHub Pages using Grunt.
Quick Start
First, fork Nog.
# clone your fork (replace YOUR_USER!)...
$ git clone git@github.com:YOUR_USER/nog.git

# switch to the nog directory...
$ cd nog

# install the dependencies...

post.title: My First Post
post.excerpt: This is my first post! I'm pretty excited.

post.title: Getting Started
post.excerpt:
Quick Start
Fork the repo and clone the fork to your local machine.
git clone git@github.com:YOUR_USER/nog.git
cd nog
Install the dependencies with NPM.   
npm install
Initialize the site with grunt init. This creates the special gh-pages 
   pages branch
